content: Generate a one-line haiku about the changing seasons in the temperate deciduous forest, taking into account the varying flora and fauna that thrive during each season and incorporating at least two literary devices such as personification or metaphor. Additionally, include a table comparing the average temperatures and precipitation levels in the forest during each season, and use at least one line of code to demonstrate how the haiku can be displayed in a visually appealing format using HTML and CSS.
